column4: Hi all, i'm seriously interested in playing with Xgl and either compiz or something along those lines... I am that crazy/stupid to do it on my laptop :)

try looking on the forums at http://ubuntuforums.org
someone might have figured it, i dont know.
p0windah: cheers,

what graphics card do you have?
oh, right
;) any clue if support is there for that card?
there would be, however i'm not sure how. i do believe you might need kernel patches, but again i'm not sure. the forum will help you alot with that, as it's an ongoing issue with ubuntu afaik
